channel.title: Comments on: Savour Chocolate and Patisserie School – Petit Gateaux

item.title: By: Dan
item.dc:creator: Dan
item.description: They all look amazing Anita! You're so talented, thanks for sharing! I hope they open a class in Sydney too!
item.content:encoded: They all look amazing Anita! You’re so talented, thanks for sharing! I hope they open a class in Sydney too!

item.title: By: Annette
item.dc:creator: Annette
item.description: Hi Anita, You have been busy!! Do you have the recipe for the Pear B. (frangipane) tart you made in the French cooking class? I would like a copy if possible. Keep up the good work. Annette
item.content:encoded:
Hi Anita,
You have been busy!!
Do you have the recipe for the Pear B. (frangipane) tart you made in the French cooking class? I would like a copy if possible.
Keep up the good work.
Annette

item.title: By: Phuoc'n Delicious
item.dc:creator: Phuoc'n Delicious
item.description: I have always wanted to do this course. Reading over this post makes me want to do it even more! I must book myself a session pronto! Well done Anita!
item.content:encoded: I have always wanted to do this course. Reading over this post makes me want to do it even more! I must book myself a session pronto! Well done Anita!

item.title: By: Ja
item.dc:creator: Ja
item.description: wow, so pretty ! I gonna take this course in July.. I wish i can do it well without doing the course 1... very excited, cant wait :D

item.title: By: The Cooking Ninja
item.dc:creator: The Cooking Ninja
item.description: They are absolutely gorgeous. wow! I was drooling at practically each photo. I'm glad nothing happened to them on the long trip back to Sydney. :)

item.title: By: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.dc:creator: Maria@TheGourmetChallenge
item.description: wow, those desserts look amazing, and you got to make them!! I'm so impressed, especially since they made such a long trip back to sydney and still survived!
item.content:encoded: wow, those desserts look amazing, and you got to make them!! I’m so impressed, especially since they made such a long trip back to sydney and still survived!

item.title: By: Anita@noredmeat
item.dc:creator: Anita@noredmeat
item.description: Wow! What an incredible experience. You should definately start a business. They all look amazing. I would buy them all from your patisserie.
item.content:encoded: Wow! What an incredible experience. You should definately start a business. They all look amazing. I would buy them all from your patisserie.
